name: ai-coach
description: AI Coach - Intelligent Training Assistant with Garmin Connect integration

scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && npm run setup:env
scripts.setup:env: cp backend/env.example backend/.env && cp frontend/env.local.example frontend/.env.local

author: AI Coach Team
